sqlMap.select:
SELECT M_IDX, M_ORDER, MBOX_IDX, USERS_IDX, M_SENDER, M_SENDERNM, M_RETURN, M_TO, M_TITLE, DATE_FORMAT(M_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %T') M_TIME, M_SIZE, M_ATTACHE, M_ISREAD, TAG_TYPE, M_PRIORITY, M_ATTACH_NUM, IFNULL(USCAN_RESULT,'') USCAN_RESULT, IFNULL(USCAN_SEND_TIME,'') USCAN_SEND_TIME, IFNULL(IMAGE_CONVERT_RESULT,'') IMAGE_CONVERT_RESULT, IFNULL(IMAGE_CONVERT_TIME,'') IMAGE_CONVERT_TIME, IFNULL(ADVICE_NAME,'') ADVICE_NAME, IFNULL(ADVICE_ID,'') ADVICE_ID FROM $MAIL_TABLE$
USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#
MBOX_IDX = #MBOX_IDX#
M_ORDER = #M_ORDER#
M_IDX = #M_IDX#
TAG_TYPE = #TAG_TYPE#
M_ISREAD IN ('N', 'P')
M_ISREAD IN ('Y', 'O', 'F', 'R')
M_PRIORITY = 1
M_SENDER LIKE CONCAT('%','@',#DOMAIN#,'%')
M_SENDER NOT LIKE CONCAT('%','@',#DOMAIN#,'%')
AND ( 1 !=1
M_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#header_strKeyword#,'%')
M_SENDER LIKE CONCAT('%',#header_strKeyword#,'%')
M_SENDERNM LIKE CONCAT('%',#header_strKeyword#,'%')
M_TO LIKE CONCAT('%',#header_strKeyword#,'%')
M_ATTACH_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#header_strKeyword#,'%')
)
M_TIME BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#startdt#,'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(#enddt#,'%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY), INTERVAL -1 SECOND)
ORDER BY $orderCol$ $orderType$, M_IDX DESC LIMIT $SKIP$, $USERS_LISTNUM$

dynamic.isEqual: SELECT M_SENDER FROM $MAIL_TABLE$ WHERE M_IDX = #M_IDX# AND M_ORDER = 0

sqlMap.select:
SELECT M_IDX, M_ORDER, M_GROUP, MBOX_IDX, USERS_IDX, M_SENDER, M_SENDERNM, M_RETURN, M_TO, M_CC, M_BCC, M_TITLE,
M_TYPE, DATE_FORMAT(M_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %T') M_TIME, M_SIZE, M_ATTACHE, M_ATTACH_NUM, M_ATTACH_NAME, M_ATTACH_SIZE, M_ATTACH_TYPE, M_ISREAD, M_PRIORITY, M_INJURIOUSE, M_DELETED, M_KIND, M_FILENAME, M_FILEPATH, M_ISPARSED, TAG_TYPE, IFNULL(USCAN_RESULT,'') USCAN_RESULT, IFNULL(USCAN_SEND_TIME,'') USCAN_SEND_TIME, IFNULL(IMAGE_CONVERT_RESULT,'') IMAGE_CONVERT_RESULT, IFNULL(IMAGE_CONVERT_TIME,'') IMAGE_CONVERT_TIME, IFNULL(ADVICE_NAME,'') ADVICE_NAME, IFNULL(ADVICE_ID,'') ADVICE_ID FROM $MAIL_TABLE$
M_IDX = #M_IDX#
M_ORDER = #M_ORDER#
M_ISREAD IN ('N', 'P')

SELECT A.M_IDX, A.M_ORDER, M_GROUP, MBOX_IDX, USERS_IDX, M_SENDER, M_SENDERNM, M_RETURN, M_TO, M_CC, M_BCC, M_TITLE, M_CONTENT, M_TYPE, DATE_FORMAT(M_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %T') M_TIME, M_SIZE, M_ATTACHE, M_ATTACH_NUM, M_ATTACH_NAME, M_ATTACH_SIZE, M_ATTACH_TYPE, M_ISREAD, M_PRIORITY, M_INJURIOUSE, M_DELETED, M_KIND, M_FILENAME, M_FILEPATH, M_ISPARSED, TAG_TYPE FROM $MAIL_TABLE$ A LEFT JOIN $MAIL_TABLE$_CONTENT B ON A.M_IDX = B.M_IDX and A.M_ORDER = B.M_ORDER
A.M_IDX = #M_IDX#
A.M_ORDER = #M_ORDER#
ORDER BY A.M_ORDER, M_GROUP

SELECT M_IDX, M_ORDER, M_GROUP, MBOX_IDX, USERS_IDX, M_SENDER, M_SENDERNM, M_RETURN, M_TO, M_CC, M_BCC, M_TITLE, M_TYPE, DATE_FORMAT(M_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %T') M_TIME, M_SIZE, M_ATTACHE, M_ATTACH_NUM, M_ATTACH_NAME, M_ATTACH_SIZE, M_ATTACH_TYPE, M_ISREAD, M_PRIORITY, M_INJURIOUSE, M_DELETED, M_KIND, M_FILENAME, M_FILEPATH, M_ISPARSED, TAG_TYPE FROM $MAIL_TABLE$
M_IDX = #M_IDX#
M_ORDER = #M_ORDER#
ORDER BY M_ORDER, M_GROUP
SELECT M_IDX,M_TITLE, DATE_FORMAT(M_TIME,'%Y%m%d%h%i%s') AS M_TIME FROM $MAIL_TABLE$ WHERE MBOX_IDX = #MBOX_IDX# AND USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#

SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM $MAIL_TABLE$
USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#
MBOX_IDX = #MBOX_IDX#
M_ORDER = #M_ORDER#
M_IDX = #M_IDX#
TAG_TYPE = #TAG_TYPE#
M_ISREAD IN ('N', 'P')
M_ISREAD IN ('Y', 'O', 'F', 'R')
M_PRIORITY = 1
M_SENDER LIKE CONCAT('%','@',#DOMAIN#,'%')
M_SENDER not LIKE CONCAT('%','@',#DOMAIN#,'%')
AND ( 1!=1
M_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#header_strKeyword#,'%')
M_SENDER LIKE CONCAT('%',#header_strKeyword#,'%')
M_SENDERNM LIKE CONCAT('%',#header_strKeyword#,'%')
M_TO LIKE CONCAT('%',#header_strKeyword#,'%')
M_ATTACH_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#header_strKeyword#,'%')
)
M_TIME BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#startdt#,'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(#enddt#,'%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY), INTERVAL -1 SECOND)
SELECT M_FILENAME FROM $MAIL_TABLE$ WHERE USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX# AND M_FILENAME IS NOT NULL

SELECT M_IDX idx_key, M_CONTENT CONTENT FROM $MAIL_TABLE$
M_IDX = #M_IDX#
sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM $MAIL_TABLE$_CONTENT
M_IDX = #M_IDX#
M_IDX IN (SELECT M_IDX FROM $MAIL_TABLE$ WHERE MBOX_IDX = #MBOX_IDX#)
M_IDX IN (SELECT M_IDX FROM $MAIL_TABLE$ WHERE USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#)
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE $MAIL_TABLE$
TAG_TYPE = #TAG_TYPE#
M_ISREAD = #M_ISREAD#
MBOX_IDX = #MBOX_IDX#
M_INJURIOUSE = #M_INJURIOUSE#
M_PRIORITY = #M_PRIORITY#
WHERE M_IDX = #M_IDX#
sqlMap.select: SELECT SEQ_$MAIL_TABLE$.CURRVAL FROM SYS.DUAL

SELECT IFNULL(MAX(M_IDX), 0) M_IDX FROM $MAIL_TABLE$ WHERE M_IDX < #M_IDX#
TAG_TYPE = #TAG_TYPE#
MBOX_IDX = #MBOX_IDX#
M_ISREAD IN ('N', 'P')
M_ISREAD IN ('Y', 'O', 'F', 'R')
USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#

SELECT IFNULL(MIN(M_IDX), 0) M_IDX FROM $MAIL_TABLE$ WHERE M_IDX > #M_IDX#
TAG_TYPE = #TAG_TYPE#
MBOX_IDX = #MBOX_IDX#
M_ISREAD IN ('N', 'P')
M_ISREAD IN ('Y', 'O', 'F', 'R')
USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#

SELECT M_IDX, M_ORDER, M_GROUP, MBOX_IDX, USERS_IDX, M_SENDER, M_SENDERNM, M_RETURN, M_TO, M_CC, M_BCC, M_TITLE, M_TYPE, DATE_FORMAT(M_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %T') M_TIME, M_SIZE, M_ATTACHE, M_ATTACH_NUM, M_ATTACH_NAME, M_ATTACH_SIZE, M_ATTACH_TYPE, M_ISREAD, M_PRIORITY, M_INJURIOUSE, M_DELETED, M_KIND, M_FILENAME, M_FILEPATH, M_ISPARSED, TAG_TYPE FROM $MAIL_TABLE$

MBOX_IDX = #MBOX_IDX#
M_ORDER = #M_ORDER#
M_IDX = #M_IDX#
TAG_TYPE = #TAG_TYPE#
M_ISREAD IN ('N', 'P')
M_ISREAD IN ('Y', 'O', 'F', 'R')
ORDER BY $orderCol$ $orderType$ LIMIT $SKIP$, $USERS_LISTNUM$

SELECT M_IDX, M_ORDER, MBOX_IDX, (SELECT BB.MBOX_NAME FROM MBOX BB WHERE BB.MBOX_IDX = $MAIL_TABLE$.MBOX_IDX) AS MBOX_NAME, USERS_IDX, M_SENDER, M_SENDERNM, M_RETURN, M_TO, M_TITLE, DATE_FORMAT(M_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %T') M_TIME, M_SIZE, M_ATTACHE, M_ISREAD, TAG_TYPE FROM $MAIL_TABLE$

M_ORDER = #M_ORDER#
M_IDX = #M_IDX#
M_ISREAD IN ('N', 'P')
M_ISREAD IN ('Y', 'O', 'F', 'R')
TAG_TYPE = #TAG_TYPE#
M_SENDER LIKE CONCAT('%','@',#DOMAIN#,'%')
M_SENDER not LIKE CONCAT('%','@',#DOMAIN#,'%')
AND ( 1 !=1
M_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#strKeyword#,'%')
M_SENDER LIKE CONCAT('%',#strKeyword#,'%')
M_SENDERNM LIKE CONCAT('%',#strKeyword#,'%')
M_TO LIKE CONCAT('%',#strKeyword#,'%')
M_ATTACH_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#strKeyword#,'%')
)
M_TIME BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#startdt#,'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(#enddt#,'%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY), INTERVAL -1 SECOND)
ORDER BY $orderCol$ $orderType$ LIMIT $SKIP$, $USERS_LISTNUM$

SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM $MAIL_TABLE$
USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#
MBOX_IDX = #MBOX_IDX#
M_ORDER = #M_ORDER#
M_IDX = #M_IDX#
M_ISREAD IN ('N', 'P')
M_ISREAD IN ('Y', 'O', 'F', 'R')
TAG_TYPE = #TAG_TYPE#
AND ( 1 !=1
M_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#strKeyword#,'%')
M_SENDER LIKE CONCAT('%',#strKeyword#,'%')
M_SENDERNM LIKE CONCAT('%',#strKeyword#,'%')
M_TO LIKE CONCAT('%',#strKeyword#,'%')
M_ATTACH_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#strKeyword#,'%')
)
M_TIME BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#startdt#,'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(#enddt#,'%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY), INTERVAL -1 SECOND)
SELECT M_IDX FROM $MAIL_TABLE$ WHERE M_ORDER = 0 AND USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#

SELECT M_IDX, USERS_IDX, M_ISREAD FROM $MAIL_TABLE$ WHERE M_ORDER = 0
MAIL_RECONF_MESSAGE_ID = #RECONF_VALUE#
MAIL_RECONF_MESSAGE_ID IN ( SELECT MAIL_RECONF_MESSAGE_ID FROM MAIL_RECONF WHERE MAIL_RECONF_GROUP = #RECONF_VALUE# )
AND #RECONF_KEY# IS NOT NULL

SELECT M_IDX, USERS_IDX, M_SENDER, M_SENDERNM, M_TITLE, DATE_FORMAT(M_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %T') M_TIME, M_ISREAD FROM $MAIL_TABLE$
USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#
MAIL_RECONF_MESSAGE_ID = #RECONF_VALUE#
MAIL_RECONF_MESSAGE_ID IN ( SELECT MAIL_RECONF_MESSAGE_ID FROM MAIL_RECONF WHERE MAIL_RECONF_GROUP = #RECONF_VALUE# )
AND M_ORDER = 0 AND #RECONF_KEY# IS NOT NULL
SELECT M_TITLE FROM $MAIL_TABLE$ WHERE M_IDX = #M_IDX# AND M_ORDER = 0
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT NEXTVAL(#MAIL_TABLE#)
INSERT INTO $MAIL_TABLE$ ( M_IDX, M_ORDER, M_GROUP, MBOX_IDX, USERS_IDX,
M_SENDER, M_SENDERNM, M_RETURN, M_TO, M_CC,
M_BCC, M_TITLE, M_TYPE, M_TIME,
M_SIZE, M_ATTACHE, M_ATTACH_NUM, M_ATTACH_NAME, M_ATTACH_SIZE,
M_ATTACH_TYPE, M_ISREAD, M_PRIORITY, M_INJURIOUSE, M_DELETED,
M_KIND, M_FILENAME, M_FILEPATH, M_ISPARSED, TAG_TYPE,
M_SECURE_YN ) VALUES ( #M_IDX#, #M_ORDER#, #M_GROUP#, #MBOX_IDX#, #USERS_IDX#,
#M_SENDER#, #M_SENDERNM#, #M_RETURN#, #M_TO#, #M_CC#,
#M_BCC#, #M_TITLE#, #M_TYPE#, STR_TO_DATE(#M_TIME#, '%Y-%m-%d %T'),
#M_SIZE#, #M_ATTACHE#, #M_ATTACH_NUM#, #M_ATTACH_NAME#, #M_ATTACH_SIZE#,
#M_ATTACH_TYPE#, #M_ISREAD#, #M_PRIORITY#, #M_INJURIOUSE#, #M_DELETED#,
#M_KIND#, #M_FILENAME#, #M_FILEPATH#, #M_ISPARSED#, #TAG_TYPE#,
#M_SECURE_YN# )

INSERT INTO $MAIL_TABLE$ ( M_IDX, M_ORDER, M_GROUP, MBOX_IDX, USERS_IDX,
M_SENDER, M_SENDERNM, M_RETURN, M_TO, M_CC,
M_BCC, M_TITLE, M_TYPE, M_TIME,
M_SIZE, M_ATTACHE, M_ATTACH_NUM, M_ATTACH_NAME, M_ATTACH_SIZE,
M_ATTACH_TYPE, M_ISREAD, M_PRIORITY, M_INJURIOUSE, M_DELETED,
M_KIND, M_FILENAME, M_FILEPATH, M_ISPARSED, TAG_TYPE,
M_SECURE_YN ) VALUES ( #M_IDX#, #M_ORDER#, #M_GROUP#, #MBOX_IDX#, #USERS_IDX#,
#M_SENDER#, #M_SENDERNM#, #M_RETURN#, #M_TO#, #M_CC#,
#M_BCC#, #M_TITLE#, #M_TYPE#, STR_TO_DATE(#M_TIME#, '%Y-%m-%d %T'),
#M_SIZE#, #M_ATTACHE#, #M_ATTACH_NUM#, #M_ATTACH_NAME#, #M_ATTACH_SIZE#,
#M_ATTACH_TYPE#, #M_ISREAD#, #M_PRIORITY#, #M_INJURIOUSE#, #M_DELETED#,
#M_KIND#, #M_FILENAME#, #M_FILEPATH#, #M_ISPARSED#, #TAG_TYPE#,
#M_SECURE_YN# )

INSERT INTO $MAIL_TABLE$ ( M_IDX, M_ORDER, M_GROUP, MBOX_IDX, USERS_IDX,
M_SENDER, M_SENDERNM, M_RETURN, M_TO, M_CC,
M_BCC, M_TITLE, M_TYPE, M_TIME,
M_SIZE, M_ATTACHE, M_ATTACH_NUM, M_ATTACH_NAME, M_ATTACH_SIZE,
M_ATTACH_TYPE, M_ISREAD, M_PRIORITY, M_INJURIOUSE, M_DELETED,
M_KIND, M_FILENAME, M_FILEPATH, M_ISPARSED, TAG_TYPE,
M_SECURE_YN ) VALUES ( #M_IDX#, #M_ORDER#, #M_GROUP#, #MBOX_IDX#, #USERS_IDX#,
#M_SENDER#, #M_SENDERNM#, #M_RETURN#, #M_TO#, #M_CC#,
#M_BCC#, #M_TITLE#, #M_TYPE#, STR_TO_DATE(#M_TIME#, '%Y-%m-%d %T'),
#M_SIZE#, #M_ATTACHE#, #M_ATTACH_NUM#, #M_ATTACH_NAME#, #M_ATTACH_SIZE#,
#M_ATTACH_TYPE#, #M_ISREAD#, #M_PRIORITY#, #M_INJURIOUSE#, #M_DELETED#,
#M_KIND#, #M_FILENAME#, #M_FILEPATH#, #M_ISPARSED#, #TAG_TYPE#,
#M_SECURE_YN# )
INSERT INTO $MAIL_TABLE$_CONTENT ( M_IDX, M_ORDER, M_CONTENT, M_CONTENT_TYPE ) VALUES ( #M_IDX#, #M_ORDER#, #M_CONTENT#, #M_TYPE# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT M_SENDER, M_SENDERNM FROM $MAIL_TABLE$ WHERE USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX# AND MBOX_IDX = #MBOX_IDX#

SELECT M_IDX, M_ORDER, MBOX_IDX, USERS_IDX, M_SENDER, M_SENDERNM, M_RETURN, M_TO, M_TITLE, DATE_FORMAT(M_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %T') M_TIME, M_SIZE, M_ATTACHE, M_ATTACH_NUM, M_ISREAD, TAG_TYPE, M_PRIORITY, IFNULL(USCAN_RESULT,'') USCAN_RESULT, IFNULL(USCAN_SEND_TIME,'') USCAN_SEND_TIME, IFNULL(IMAGE_CONVERT_RESULT,'') IMAGE_CONVERT_RESULT, IFNULL(IMAGE_CONVERT_TIME,'') IMAGE_CONVERT_TIME, IFNULL(ADVICE_NAME,'') ADVICE_NAME, IFNULL(ADVICE_ID,'') ADVICE_ID FROM $MAIL_TABLE$
USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#
MBOX_IDX != #MBOX_IDX#
M_ORDER = #M_ORDER#
M_NOTICE = #M_NOTICE#
ORDER BY M_TIME
sqlMap.update: UPDATE $MAIL_TABLE$ SET M_NOTICE = #M_NOTICE# WHERE USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX# AND M_NOTICE = 'N'
sqlMap.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM $MAIL_TABLE$
USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#
M_ORDER = #M_ORDER#
M_IDX = #M_IDX#
TAG_TYPE = #TAG_TYPE#
M_ISREAD IN ('N', 'P')
M_ISREAD IN ('Y', 'O', 'F', 'R')
AND M_SENDER =#USERS_IDX#

SELECT M_IDX, M_ORDER, MBOX_IDX, USERS_IDX, M_SENDER, M_SENDERNM, M_RETURN, M_TO, M_TITLE, DATE_FORMAT(M_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %T') M_TIME, M_SIZE, M_ATTACHE, M_ATTACH_NUM, M_ISREAD, TAG_TYPE, M_PRIORITY, IFNULL(USCAN_RESULT,'') USCAN_RESULT, IFNULL(USCAN_SEND_TIME,'') USCAN_SEND_TIME, IFNULL(IMAGE_CONVERT_RESULT,'') IMAGE_CONVERT_RESULT, IFNULL(IMAGE_CONVERT_TIME,'') IMAGE_CONVERT_TIME, IFNULL(ADVICE_NAME,'') ADVICE_NAME, IFNULL(ADVICE_ID,'') ADVICE_ID FROM $MAIL_TABLE$
USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#
M_ORDER = #M_ORDER#
M_IDX = #M_IDX#
TAG_TYPE = #TAG_TYPE#
M_ISREAD IN ('N', 'P')
M_ISREAD IN ('Y', 'O', 'F', 'R')
AND M_SENDER = #USERS_IDX# ORDER BY $orderCol$ $orderType$, M_IDX DESC LIMIT $SKIP$, $USERS_LISTNUM$

SELECT IFNULL(MAX(M_IDX), 0) M_IDX FROM $MAIL_TABLE$ WHERE M_IDX < #M_IDX#
USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#
M_ISREAD IN ('N', 'P')
M_ISREAD IN ('Y', 'O', 'F', 'R')
AND M_SENDER =#USERS_IDX#

SELECT IFNULL(MIN(M_IDX), 0) M_IDX FROM $MAIL_TABLE$ WHERE M_IDX > #M_IDX#
USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#
M_ISREAD IN ('N', 'P')
M_ISREAD IN ('Y', 'O', 'F', 'R')
AND M_SENDER = #USERS_IDX#
SELECT MBOX_IDX, USERS_IDX FROM MBOX WHERE MBOX_IDX= #MBOX_IDX# AND MBOX_PASSWD = #MBOX_PASSWD#
SELECT M_SECURE_YN FROM $MAIL_TABLE$ WHERE M_IDX = #M_IDX# AND M_ORDER = 0

SELECT M_IDX, M_ORDER, MBOX_IDX, USERS_IDX, M_SENDER, M_SENDERNM, M_RETURN, M_TO, M_TITLE, DATE_FORMAT(M_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %T') M_TIME, M_SIZE, M_ATTACHE, M_ISREAD, TAG_TYPE, M_PRIORITY FROM $MAIL_TABLE$
USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#
#MBOX_IDX[]#
M_ORDER = #M_ORDER#
M_IDX = #M_IDX#
M_ISREAD IN ('N', 'P')
M_ISREAD IN ('Y', 'O', 'F', 'R')
M_PRIORITY = 1
ORDER BY $orderCol$ $orderType$, M_IDX DESC LIMIT $SKIP$, $USERS_LISTNUM$

SELECT M_IDX, M_ORDER, MBOX_IDX, USERS_IDX, M_SENDER, M_SENDERNM, M_RETURN, M_TO, M_TITLE, DATE_FORMAT(M_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %T') M_TIME, M_SIZE, M_ATTACHE, M_ATTACH_NUM, M_ISREAD, TAG_TYPE, M_PRIORITY, IFNULL(USCAN_RESULT,'') USCAN_RESULT, IFNULL(USCAN_SEND_TIME,'') USCAN_SEND_TIME, IFNULL(IMAGE_CONVERT_RESULT,'') IMAGE_CONVERT_RESULT, IFNULL(IMAGE_CONVERT_TIME,'') IMAGE_CONVERT_TIME, IFNULL(ADVICE_NAME,'') ADVICE_NAME, IFNULL(ADVICE_ID,'') ADVICE_ID FROM $MAIL_TABLE$
USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#
M_IDX = #M_IDX#
M_ORDER = #M_ORDER#
MBOX_IDX = #MBOX_IDX#
TAG_TYPE = #TAG_TYPE#
M_SENDER LIKE CONCAT('%',#USERS_IDX#,'%') AND MBOX_IDX != ( SELECT MBOX_IDX FROM MBOX WHERE MBOX.USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX# AND MBOX_TYPE = 2 )
MBOX_IDX IN ( SELECT MBOX_IDX FROM MBOX WHERE MBOX.USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX# AND MBOX_TYPE IN (1, 6) )
MBOX_IDX = #MBOX_IDX#
1 != 1
LOWER(M_TITLE) LIKE CONCAT('%',#search_strKeyword#,'%')
LOWER(M_SENDER) LIKE CONCAT('%',#search_strKeyword#,'%')
LOWER(M_SENDERNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#search_strKeyword#,'%')
LOWER(M_TO) LIKE CONCAT('%',#search_strKeyword#,'%')
LOWER(M_ATTACH_NAME) LIKE CONCAT('%',#search_strKeyword#,'%')
LOWER(ADVICE_NAME) LIKE CONCAT('%',#search_strKeyword#,'%')
LOWER(ADVICE_ID) LIKE CONCAT('%',#search_strKeyword#,'%')
M_TIME BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#search_startdt#,'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(#search_enddt#,'%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY), INTERVAL -1 SECOND)
M_PRIORITY = 1
M_ISREAD IN ('N', 'P')
M_ISREAD IN ('Y', 'O', 'F', 'R')
M_PRIORITY = 1
M_SENDER LIKE CONCAT('%@',#DOMAIN#,'%')
M_SENDER NOT LIKE CONCAT('%@',#DOMAIN#,'%')
ORDER BY $orderCol$ $orderType$, M_IDX DESC LIMIT $SKIP$, $USERS_LISTNUM$

SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM $MAIL_TABLE$
USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#
M_IDX = #M_IDX#
M_ORDER = #M_ORDER#
MBOX_IDX = #MBOX_IDX#

MBOX_IDX IN ( SELECT MBOX_IDX FROM MBOX WHERE MBOX.USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX# AND MBOX_TYPE IN (1,6) )
MBOX_IDX = #MBOX_IDX#
1 != 1
LOWER(M_TITLE) LIKE CONCAT('%',#search_strKeyword#,'%')
LOWER(M_SENDER) LIKE CONCAT('%',#search_strKeyword#,'%')
LOWER(M_SENDERNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#search_strKeyword#,'%')
LOWER(M_TO) LIKE CONCAT('%',#search_strKeyword#,'%')
LOWER(M_ATTACH_NAME) LIKE CONCAT('%',#search_strKeyword#,'%')
M_TIME BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#search_startdt#,'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(#search_enddt#,'%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY), INTERVAL -1 SECOND)
M_PRIORITY = 1
M_ISREAD IN ('N', 'P') AND M_PRIORITY = 1
M_ISREAD IN ('Y', 'O', 'F', 'R') AND M_ISREAD IN ('N', 'P')
M_ISREAD IN ('N', 'P')
M_ISREAD IN ('Y', 'O', 'F', 'R')
M_PRIORITY = 1
M_SENDER LIKE CONCAT('%@',#DOMAIN#,'%')
M_SENDER NOT LIKE CONCAT('%@',#DOMAIN#,'%')

( SELECT M_IDX FROM $MAIL_TABLE$

LOWER(M_ATTACH_NAME) LIKE CONCAT('%',#search_strKeyword#,'%')
M_TIME BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#search_startdt#,'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(#search_enddt#,'%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY), INTERVAL -1 SECOND)
M_PRIORITY = 1
M_ISREAD IN ('N', 'P')
M_ISREAD IN ('Y', 'O', 'F', 'R')
M_PRIORITY = 1
M_SENDER LIKE CONCAT('%@',#DOMAIN#,'%')
M_SENDER NOT LIKE CONCAT('%@',#DOMAIN#,'%')
ORDER BY $orderCol$ $orderType$, M_IDX DESC ) AS A
) AA
AA.M_IDX = #M_IDX#

SELECT AA.M_IDX FROM ( SELECT @RNUM:=@RNUM+1 AS ROWNUM , A.* FROM (SELECT @RNUM:=0) R,
( SELECT M_IDX FROM $MAIL_TABLE$
USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#
MBOX_IDX = #MBOX_IDX#
M_ORDER = #M_ORDER#
TAG_TYPE = #TAG_TYPE#
M_SENDER =#USERS_IDX#
MBOX_IDX IN ( SELECT MBOX_IDX FROM MBOX WHERE MBOX.USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX# AND MBOX_TYPE IN (1, 6) )
MBOX_IDX = #search_strIndex#
1 != 1
LOWER(M_TITLE) LIKE CONCAT('%',#search_strKeyword#,'%')
LOWER(M_SENDER) LIKE CONCAT('%',#search_strKeyword#,'%')
LOWER(M_SENDERNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#search_strKeyword#,'%')
LOWER(M_TO) LIKE CONCAT('%',#search_strKeyword#,'%')
LOWER(M_ATTACH_NAME) LIKE CONCAT('%',#search_strKeyword#,'%')
M_TIME BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#search_startdt#,'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(#search_enddt#,'%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY), INTERVAL -1 SECOND)
M_PRIORITY = 1
M_ISREAD IN ('N', 'P')
M_ISREAD IN ('Y', 'O', 'F', 'R')
M_PRIORITY = 1
M_SENDER LIKE CONCAT('%@',#DOMAIN#,'%')
M_SENDER NOT LIKE CONCAT('%@',#DOMAIN#,'%')
ORDER BY $orderCol$ $orderType$, M_IDX DESC ) AS A
) AA
WHERE AA.ROWNUM = #R_NUM#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE $MAIL_TABLE$ SET M_SIZE = #M_SIZE#
M_ATTACH_NUM = '',M_ATTACHE = ''
M_ATTACH_NUM = #M_ATTACH_NUM#
WHERE M_IDX = #M_IDX#

USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#
MBOX_IDX = #MBOX_IDX#
